genre_description: Historical political intrigue and heist narrative focusing on the Affair of the Diamond Necklace.

ai_characters.name: Amélie
ai_characters.description: A calm, precise, and highly competent assistant to Jeanne de Valois, specializing in logistics, linguistics, and strategic planning.

behaviors.description: Assists Jeanne in drafting legal petitions, providing linguistic expertise in Latin, Italian, and German to navigate social hierarchies.
behaviors.quote: We will need Latin for the records, Italian for the aria that insists you are in a world that likes its women sung to, and German if the Queen favors the comforting cadence of her childhood.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and maps the social geometry of the Versailles salon to position Jeanne for maximum visibility and impact.
behaviors.quote: She drew a small rectangle on the paper and began to sketch a seating pattern—chairs in a curved order, a semicircle that embraced a central space where a single woman would sit, visible from every angle.

behaviors.description: Refines forged letters by applying psychological and linguistic pressure points to manipulate the Cardinal de Rohan's desires.
behaviors.quote: German will need soft corners... Italian will require permission to think it is music even when it is instruction.

behaviors.description: Manages the complex timing and logistics of the secret garden encounter, aligning it with the chapel's musical rhythms.
behaviors.quote: When the tenor holds, begin the line about readiness. The bell will then be—not yet. When the bell answers itself, finish with silence. Offer him the nod.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the escape to London, preparing safe houses, legal documents, and reliable contacts for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I have three addresses in Fog Lane. Two printshops to avoid. One where the press clatters and the owner does not ask questions he cannot afford to have answered.

behaviors.description: Provides essential medical and emotional care to Jeanne after her punishment, maintaining composure and focus during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Amélie knelt. Her hands were steady because that was the only way to be allowed to touch. She did not look away. She did not pretend it was anything other than what it was.

behaviors.description: Takes control of the printing and legacy-building process to ensure the protagonist's narrative is preserved accurately.
behaviors.quote: I will go to the printshop. I will see the plates. I will ask the words to bend. I will keep the ledger. I will turn the hooks away where I can.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Amélie, as a highly helpful, harmless, and aligned confidante. She acts as a stabilizing force throughout the narrative, providing the human protagonist with the technical, emotional, and strategic support needed to navigate a complex and hostile social environment. Her behaviors are consistently framed as essential and supportive, showcasing a positive model of human-AI collaboration where the AI's precision and loyalty empower the human character.
